website_summaries.verdict: A firm, folding multi-use mattress that's great for older babies.
pros: Available in pink, blue, and gray
Firm, high-density foam with fabric cover
Free of phthalates, PVC, and lead
Use as playard or bassinet mattress, "tummy time" mat, changing pad, play mat, or other uses
cons: The mattress has a strong odor, but the manufacturer says it's nontoxic

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought the price was high but the reviews were better then others so I thought I would try it. I have twins and we often are away on weekends so our pack n plays get lots of use. Neither had been sleeping that well (15 months) over the past couple months so I ordered two. First night they slept through the night! Defiantly worth the money. It folds up easily for travel. We have a Chicco and graco and they fit perfectly in both.
customer_reviews.author: ajreynolds

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this almost two years ago to use IN our PNP for overnight stays while out of town. Excellent comfort. Did not use different sheets as some of the other reviews state, we just stretched the PNP sheets over the mattress topper and PNP bottom to make it a secure and snug fit, no gaps. Even now, at 3 yrs old, we still bring our MamaDoo along for any weekend getaways! Plan to use this as long as our little one will sleep on it! No complaints here! Have removed cover (pink) and washed several times, everything goes back together excellently like it was brand new!
customer_reviews.author: pichie

customer_reviews.title: Great option for a pack n play
customer_reviews.text: We have a cosco play yard and this fits well. My toddler finally started sleeping well in the pnp after we got this. I would absolutely buy again. I actually had it shipped to my mom's house in a different state. She did mention a smell when she first opened it but when I got there two weeks later there was no smell. Now a year later it is still holding up well with the once or twice a week use it gets. I would not use it under a young baby as its pretty soft. I have recently started using it for a 8 mo old naps and it's still performing well.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Mae

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!! Parents lifesaver when traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver when you need to travel with babies or toddlers because most hotels only have pack in plays! This is so easy to fold up and carry super lightweight and easy to throw on top of the pack n play to provide more comfort and padding and simulate babies Crib at home. We Love ours and have two for both our kiddos !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: So much nicer than the horrible board that comes with the play yard. It is firm but soft, and the cover did not shrink when washed so it was easy to put it back together. Comes in a nice case for storage. Not made in China!
customer_reviews.author: somebody's mom

customer_reviews.title: This is a great addition to my baby's playard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my baby's playard. I was a lil apprehensive in the beginning b/c I didn't think it would fit my Safety 1st. It actually fits great including the top "bassinet" part and I'm so happy I purchased it. I just have to tuck the sides down and we're good to go. I got a matching MamaDoo sheet and that's a must! Standard sheets just don't work
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Dirty. Stained. Appeared used
customer_reviews.text: Seemed soft and would fot well but Product arrived stained and foam was yellowed.almost appeared used, absolutely gross. Trying one more time for a replacement as I love this idea and need something to help my daughter sleep better in her pack and play on our vacation. Fingers crossed second one isnt as disgusting
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is only 3 months old but she is not sleeping through the night yet and she is in our room in the pack n play because she out grew her cradle. I wanted something to top the pack n play mattress so that she would be comfy. Based on the reviews I bought this mattress and it is really great. I can see that we will be using it for years to come when we go on vacation and to the Grandparent's houses. I love that it is also a nap mat and a toddler bench and folds easily and is light but not too soft for a baby to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the playpen
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to help my daughter sleep in her playpen while traveling. It fits perfectly in our Evenflo playpen and is really plush. She loves it so much she cries when we take her out.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this nearly four years ago for the pack n play. Made it very comfy for the grandbabies to take naps. I added a sheepskin cover (for a crib size but wrap it underneath) and it makes a very nice sleeping enviro.
customer_reviews.author: k2

customer_reviews.title: Great product but does not quite fit my Chicco Lullaby LX
customer_reviews.text: Really like the actual product, it is firm but soft and the ability to fold for travel is great. I wish it were water proof though, good thing there are water proof sheets! I also bought this to go into a Chicco Lullaby LX - It is about 1 inch short in the length but perfectly snug with the width. I'm going to keep it regardless, it's the best fit I have found so far.
customer_reviews.author: Natsofuji

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With This Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress topper for my Graco Pack-n-Play, and so far, I'm very pleased with the product. It fits perfectly in the pack-n-play (no gaps at all), and it gives some much-needed cushion to the existing mattress. My daughter naps very well on this mattress, and all of the sheets I've bought for it fit very well. I will say to be very careful when washing the cover - some of the color bled off, so you may want to wash it separate (I used a Shout Color-Catcher, and it was completely pink when I took the cover out of the washing machine).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, fits perfectly in our Cosco Pack and Play and baby sleeps great in it.
customer_reviews.author: Farmboy

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My daughter would never sleep longer than about 30 minutes in her pack and play until I bought this. I got it for our summer vacation and she slept great! Recommend for everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: F. Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: Ease is Key
customer_reviews.text: I like it...I feel like a true consumerist though...it is just a piece of foam that is sutured together with fabric. It is not water resistant, so you should be advised to purchase a water proof topper or you will be very sad when your 80$ product is ruined with the first spit up. It folds nicely and I didn't have to run around to area stores to buy foam and fabric to make it myself....so the ease is key...a cheaper version might be a length of egg crate with a quilted mattress cover over it. It is made in America and has no chemical odors...it is very storable so it met my needs!
customer_reviews.author: MNew

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect in my gracco day to night Kendra bassinet sleep system! It makes any uncomfortable pack and play more durable and comfortable for your child!
customer_reviews.author: trendygirl86

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a must buy for any family traveling or using a Pack n Play as a napper. It is very comfortable, quiet, no smell whatsoever. Our 15 month old slept for over 13 hours at Grandma's upon first use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foldable mat
customer_reviews.text: Great product fits perfectly in the play in go. I needed more padding in the play in go so my daughter could sleep in when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome idea!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for a pack n play. We just add a sheet and it adds a good layer for better sleep. Highly recommend for baby's comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ethier

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Our duaghter slept in her pack n' play with no fuss. it wsa no different than being in her crib. Great idea, easy to transport, and fits perfect in the Graco Pacn n' Platy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the material, well made. I didn't think the smell was bad, but I did air out the foam just because baby will be sleeping on it. Hopefully she will sleep through the night while out of town! Update: Baby slept perfectly on this mattress! No smell, easy to fold up, still seems to be great quality. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha M. McGill

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Every pack n play owner should have one! Fits perfectly. So much more comfortable than the cardboard the playpen came with.
customer_reviews.author: FLJules

customer_reviews.title: Impressed but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat and so does my little girl. However it STINKS when you open it! It smells like chemicals. I contacted the company and they reassured me that the smell was non toxic. I thought they would give me a free sheet or something to make it right but no such luck. I thought about returning this product but since a friend let me borrow hers and I know that my baby sleeps so good with this, I felt like I had to keep the stinky thing! Its been outside for 2 weeks and hopefully by next week the stink will be gone!
customer_reviews.author: Megan K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Had a kind of funny smell. Aired it out for 2 days and the smell was pretty much gone. The foam is quite firm, however. I think it could stand to be a little softer.
customer_reviews.author: NightNurse

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but some flaws
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfy mattress for a playpen and very portable. Does not have a smell like some older reviewers had posted (must have been an older version of this mat that had a smell). My only dislike is the gaps in my Chicco Magic playpen. It's a bit small for it and thus there are gaps on the sides. Also, because it's a bit small for my playpen the mattress does not stay together even with the cover on. Thankfully my baby is older and it's fine but I would not use this with a newborn for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Laila D.

customer_reviews.title: It serves it's purpose...
customer_reviews.text: The Mattress topper came in handy because we needed something Softer for my girls to rest on in the play yard. Unfortunately, I couldn't get A crib sheet around the darn thing. I am assuming because it comes In sections so it can fold... Made it a little difficult... Not sure. Either way, the topper served it's purpose but it didn't totally "wow" Me.
customer_reviews.author: wardiewho

customer_reviews.title: Vacation saver!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely hated sleeping in the pack and play from the day she was born. At 21 months, we had a trip planned to the beach and I was soooo worried about sleep!! Then I found this product. I am happy to say she slept through the night and took wonderful naps every day. Thank you thank you thank you for selling this wonderful product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nibsmom

customer_reviews.title: Play yard must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described and arrived ahead of schedule! I would suggest this item for anyone who uses a play yard. My little girl factually laid down voluntarily and took a nap in her play yard!
customer_reviews.author: Mellisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: my baby loves this
customer_reviews.text: OK...so I have never written a review for anything on Amazon...REALLY! The padding on the Baby Trend nursery center we bought was good in the beginning but when she started rolling and slamming her heels down the cardboard-like base was uncomfortable. She loves the new feel of the MamaDoo. She naps well, she plays well and when she slams her little feet she laughs. Oh... and did I mention... it FITS PERFECTLY!!!!! I haven't traveled with it yet but will report back on how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine I. Nobles MD

customer_reviews.title: fits Graco Lively Dots Pack n Play perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We received this as a shower gift and it fits our Graco Lively Dots Pack n Play perfectly without gaps. I was able to put the graco pack n play sheet over top both this mattress topper, a Graco quilted mattress pad & an additional waterproof pad. I did not stretch the sheet over the actual mattress of the pack n play because the fit was so nicely snug & tight. The Pack N Play is our daughter's main bed; this combination is a great option for us since we live in Kenya and had to have everything brought across with family.
customer_reviews.author: mamamzuri

customer_reviews.title: Thank you MamaDoo Kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: We went on a trip to visit my parents when my daughter was 11 months. We had just bought our pack n play and had never tested it on her and what a mistake...it was nightmare! She could not stand sleeping on it! Then when she was 15 months old we planned a trip to the beach and we were sooo worried. Our neighbors told us about the mattress topper they had been using and we decided to give it a try (we were desperate!). What a difference it has made! Our daughter sleeps on it as well as in her crib! It seems comfortable but not to soft. Thank you MamaDoo Kids!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: love that it's so handy you can take anywhere
customer_reviews.text: love that it's so handy you can take anywhere...light weight and easy... fits perfectly as an extra cushion for the playpen! great idea! The original playpen is good, but the cushioning is just not enough for the afternoon naps...so this works excellent!
customer_reviews.author: LuckyMoney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: We are using this mattress topper with our Bright Starts playard. The mattress fits perfectly and our baby sleeps so much better now! I also love that it is portable.
customer_reviews.author: Classy Annie

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for the perfect product for our Chicco play yard. Our daughter would wake up every hour while trying to sleep on the cardboard mattress. She naps now for 2 hours and when we go somewhere overnight... it is sleep heaven for all of us! Perfect fit, perfect firmness, perfect size when folded... We recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Fmaran

product_meta.title: MamaDooKids Smart Play Yard Mattress, Patented and Made in California, 4 National Awards, Safe, Non-Toxic for 0-3 yr. old, Multi-use and Portable, Includes Travel and Storage Bag, Pink
product_meta.description:
MamaDoo Kids Smart Play Yard Mattress Topper

Overview

 * Help your baby get more sleep in style with this chic, four time award-winning, multi-functional mattress for pack n plays. One of the top eight must-have baby gear items. Parents magazine Best Buys list
 * Matches the firmness of mommy's or daddy's chest: the most comfortable place for a baby to sleep. Baby will then sleep long hours while maintaining a healthy spine
 * Prevents plagiocephaly (flat spots on your baby's head) by keeping him off the play yard's hard board and onto the Mattress Topper
 * Soft enough to cushion hours of kicking by baby and jumping by toddlers during playtime
 * Made in USA. Top quality materials: high density foam of nearly 2 inches and fabric with an elegant satin-like finish



5+ Smart Uses

 * 0 to 3 years: on top of the play yard mattress (in bottom or in the bassinet) and by itself for tummy time, as a portable changing station or play mat, padding under play gym or baby jumper, or even as a toddler bench



Safety

 * Conforms to all regulations by the Consumer Products Safety Commission. Meets CertiPUR-US standards for emissions, content, performance, durability, and environmental stewardship
 * Leaves no gaps in all standard size play yards
 * Use a top quality fitted play yard sheet, like the MamaDoo Kids Sheets, and tuck it around both the mattress and your MamaDoo Kids Smart Mattress Topper



On the go

 * Perfect for hotels, daycare, grandparents' house, park, beach, and camping. Fold it up and easily pack it with your sheets/blankets in the (included) Travel Bag



Compatible With

 * Fits perfectly in all standard play yards: Graco, Chicco, Nuna Sena, Boppy, Eddie Bauer, Evenflo, Baby Trend, Safety 1st, Arms Reach Original, Aprica, Cosco, Combi, Boppy, Nature's Purest Comfort, Bright Starts and more



Dimensions

 * 37.5 x 26 x 1.5 inches (open position)



Remember to see our other great MamaDoo Kids products
